CustomField.description: External ID and unique identifier for the add on product lines. Add Ons are associated with the base product line through the Parent ID field which matches the Company Base ID of the base product.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: External ID and unique identifier for the add on product lines. Add Ons are associated with the base product line through the Parent ID field which matches the Company Base ID of the base product.
CustomField.label: Company Enrollment ID
